column2: An order of wizards stretching across the whole of Europe, bound by an oath that keeps them from fighting each other or trying to rule the mundanes.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait to Bind a Familiar, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait to Bind a Familiar, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
As a [Root.GetSocietyRank], I can summon a supernatural beast to be my companion. This familiar will be my eyes and ears, as well as imbue me with its powers.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]! has not enchanted a talisman in the past 5 years\n
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait to Enchant a Talisman, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
What kind of Talisman do you wish to enchant?
I wish to enchant a deadly weapon as my Talisman!
I wish to enchant a mighty staff as my Talisman!
I wish to enchant a mysterious mask as my Talisman!
I wish to enchant an imposing scepter as my Talisman!
SUPER DUPER KING OF ALL MAGIC

The Order of Hermes organizes itself in regional tribunals composed of individual covenants. Regional tribunals and covenants are free to rule themselves as they see fit, so long as they don't violate any of the rules of higher instances.
